Description/Rules: 
Number of Participant(s): 1 
Time Allotted: 1 Hour 
• The crossword will be based on basic knowledge of software, hardware, IT buzzwords, acronyms, abbreviations, recent technological developments, eminent personalities, IT Companies etc. 
• Solving the crossword will require out of the box thinking. 
• The event will take place in two rounds: 
First Round:
 It will be a written round. A crossword will be provided to the participants which has to be filled in a span of one hour. 
• 6 teams will qualify for the finals. 
Second Round: 
This round will be held on stage. A crossword will be displayed on the screen and the round will progress in a quiz format. 
• Skills Required: Basic knowledge of software, hardware, IT buzzwords, acronyms, abbreviations, recent technological developments, eminent personalities, IT Companies etc.

● The team scoring highest marks will win coupons, vouchers and price rewards.
